dim.description: dim, barely revealing the shapes around you and leaving most corners lost in shadow.

glowing.description: glowing with a steady, unnatural light that seems to come from nowhere.

flickering.description: flickering erratically, as if struggling to stay alive.

starlit.description: starlit, with tiny specks above casting a cold, celestial shimmer.

blinding.description: blinding, flooding the space with overwhelming brilliance and harsh contrast.

bioluminescent.description: bioluminescent, seeping from strange moss and fungi that pulse with eerie rhythm.

shadow_drenched.description: shadow drenched, with barely a glimmer to outline the void around you.

pulsing.description: pulsing gently, as if the chamber itself were breathing light in and out.

ethereal_glow.description: bathed in an ethereal glow that feels both soothing and unnatural.

candle_lit.description: candle lit, casting warm, trembling shadows that dance along the walls.
